website_summaries.verdict: A fun, adjustable swim diaper that will last your child throughout their first few years.
pros: Adjustable design that can grow with your child
Snaps make them easy to put on and take off
cons: Even on the largest size, it may be too small for large infants and toddlers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, but the buttons on the inside I do not like.
customer_reviews.text: These Swim Diapers are made of light fabric, easy to put and ventilated. Good price for two pieces. Fast delivery . I only worry about the buttons on the inside. I think if the baby is sitting for a long time, they will be marked on his skin. But the kids on the beach and the pool are very active, should not be a problem. My child is 1 and a half years old, for him they fit well. Update: we have used this swim diapers a several times - they are really good. My worries about the plastic buttons for now are unjustified.
customer_reviews.author: Care Bears 🧸🧸🧸🧸

customer_reviews.title: Did its job!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9.5lb, 20in, 2 month old baby boy perfectly on the smallest size. Kept the dirty stuff in, didn’t leak, and of course didn’t swell up like a normal diaper would in the water. They wash just fine, too. Didn’t do anything special and they turned out the same way they went in...minus the poop, lol. I’ll be buying more for a vacation we are taking!
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Great swim diaper for customized fit
customer_reviews.text: We are not cloth diaper users, however, my daughter was too small for disposable swim diapers when we were leaving for vacation in the Caymans. These are awesome because you can really adjust them to fit your baby due to there being a bunch of different snaps. This really allows for a customized fit, and longer use of the diaper as you can adjust it as your baby grows. Great price for 2 diapers as well. Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but small
customer_reviews.text: Pros: they keep the bad stuff in, the print is adorable, they are priced really well (disposable swim diapers are really expensive), they wash really well Cons: he is going to grow out of them in a couple of months and he’s only 7 months old (they are smaller than they purport, but my baby is a fatty!)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany & Rob Marvin

customer_reviews.title: The snaps makes it easy to grow in
customer_reviews.text: One and a half years later these are still holding up. We bought these because water diapers are so expensive. We've used these two for two summers. We've washed them almost every time as well (we swim at least 3-4 times a week). The snaps makes it easy to grow in. We've recommended them to all our friends and they love them too. They look super cute so if you're just using them as a bathing suit they're fashionable, but we usually put a suit over them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and secure swim diapers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these diapers! As long as one doesn't mind/totally enjoys diaper adjustment for that ideal fit, these are a lot of fun. In the same spirit as your average adjustable diaper, these provide a snug fit according to the baby bottom in question. The designs are adorable, and I have had the joy/horror of taking my kid swimming for some time before realizing she pooped--they're that secure. The 2 pack is a wonderful deal, for things like my aforementioned situation.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these diapers. Not only the pattern but I also like the fact I won't be using disposables anymore. They look so cute on and not gross and bulky. They are easy to wash. I do not put them in the dryer. I purchased the large size but they are a little snug on my son even though he isnt that big. He is 2 years old 26.3 lbs. We will see how how long we will be able to use them. Would def buy again. Wish I would have bought them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: VaneRivas

customer_reviews.title: Breastfed Baby Approved!
customer_reviews.text: These work awesome! I was slightly concerned, because my daughter is breastfed and these are only to collect “solids”. Breastfeeding mothers know that their babies don’t have solid poos, so I wasn’t sure if we were going to have a situation on our hands. But these swim diapers totally did the trick! Easy to use, easy to clean and the pool is still clean as well! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Weatherwax

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for my 5 month old during our first beach trip. Work perfectly and are great quality. Would definitely repurchase! So glad I didn't need to bother with disposable swim diapers. These are much cuter and less hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Chuemup2

customer_reviews.title: Room to grow
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these in the water yet but the fit on my 8 month girl (80% weight/height) was good. I had it on the lowest height setting and middle waist setting. It fit snug but there is definitely room for growth. I hope to get a couple years of use out of these! My 8 month old is currently in size 3 disposable diaper and wears 12 month clothing. Hope that helps :)
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: My daughter weighs about 14 lbs and this fit fine. I'm glad there were two
customer_reviews.text: My daughter weighs about 14 lbs and this fit fine. I'm glad there were two, though. Quick story, we lent the other for a friends child and it was expertly soiled. We bagged it, set it aside and forgot about it while we had a few pops. You know how this story goes, the next thing you know, it's been sitting overnight and in the hot sun for about 6 hours. And for this price, it's not even a discussion. They're cute and all, but "Good Night, Irene"; these things went were tossed directly, no regrets. But, where was I? Oh, cute design, fit well, and appear versatile for growth. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sure the pattern is pretty but it goes downhill from there...
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the sizes that they post for one second. If your baby is beyond 15lbs go to the "large size". The "one size" that they say can hold up to 40lbs, did not hold my daughter who is 25lbs. Also, before I got the diaper on her, one of the clasps came off! I see I'm not the only one who's been duped.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Swim Diapers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both this size (0-24 mon) and the larger size (0-3 yrs) based on reviews complaining about tightness in the thigh area and ended up keeping these and returning the larger ones. These diapers are amazing and are not the least bit too tight on my gigantic 2yo who is in the 90th percentile for weight. They hold everything in and wash easily. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: BBW

customer_reviews.title: Size seems small
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can adjust the size with the buttons, however, I have them at the largest setting and they seem really tight on my 17lb, 8 month old. They leave red streaks across her waist and thighs. Not really sure how they can last her until she's two years old. I reached out to the seller to see if I was buttoning it incorrectly, but never received a response. The material is very nice and soft though and while, she has yet to poop in them, it seems like it would be very easy to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I know they're adjustable but I thought they would be bigger. My baby is only in a size 2 diaper and is in the largest adjustable size. I snapped the snaps one size smaller but they actually cut circulation off of her legs and they started to turn purple. I probably will have to buy new ones for next year although when I bought them I thought they would fit for a few years. I'm not sure if they're super absorbent or my baby just doesn't really go in them. I'm thinking they're probably just really absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sanchez Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: One Size Does Not Fit All
customer_reviews.text: These do the job, but with first use my 11 month old already had to be put on the last set of snaps. He is nowhere near chunky, actually a very slender baby. I'm pretty disappointed that these will last for a very short period of time. Also, the page suggests size smalls and large, but there is literally no option for that "One Size fits all." But the snaps only help if your baby is using them from maybe 1 month to 10 months. Pictures indicate babies up to at least a little over a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Must have for summer!
customer_reviews.text: These are swim diapers, so they obviously won’t absorb pee, but they do a great job of keeping the poop in! The first time I put my baby in these, he pooped (of course!), and they were super easy to clean! No spots or stains were left in the diaper. I am glad I went with these over disposable or even a more expensive brand. I love that these are a great price, super cute, and just all around great diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not for child over 30 pounds
customer_reviews.text: does NOT fit well at them upper weight level. My son is 33 pounds, 38 inches tall. Probably doesn't need them, but where he takes swim lessons requires swim diaper for his age. They barely snap and while a snug fit is ideal, these are VERY tight around his little legs. I would recommend for a toddler/infant weighing less than 30 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for pee.. Not great for poop
customer_reviews.text: These swim diapers are amazing! They do not hold in poop like "swimmers" or swim diapers. If you child poops in these diapers it WILL fall out into the water!! Otherwise, it was a great purchase and saves us from buying a pack of swim diapers each week during our vacation
customer_reviews.author: JessMotes

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these with my son this summer and fall and I love them. He has pooped in them while in the pool and NONE of it leaked into the pool. I know that’s completely gross, but when you swim every day you really don’t want poop in the pool. I take them off him and throw them in the washer and they are ready to go for another swim. Also they have lots of snaps on the sides so as he grows they can still fit him and I won’t need to buy a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Leeder

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool poopers!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for swim lessons as our daughter seems to be a frequent pool pooper. We use them over a disposable swim diaper and put her swim bottoms over these as a 3rd layer. All 3 together help contain any mess. They don’t absorb much, more so help contain. Easy snap removal and washable. They have been used and washed MANY times without falling apart or deteriorating.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for my little guy
customer_reviews.text: I spent a embarrassing amount of time researching the perfect swim diaper. However, a diaper that wasn't going to leave us as "the people who shut down the pool" was very important to me as we planned on going to numerous waterparks this summer. My little is guy was 6 months old when I first purchased these for a trip to Clearwater and is now 8 months old; the fit is flawless. The "one size" really sold me on these and I'm really glad that I went with them. Love the design and fit, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TIffanyB

customer_reviews.title: I can use confidently at the pool!
customer_reviews.text: These are very fitted around the legs without being too tight. My son is almost 2 and it fits well by itself or under swim trunks. They contain urine very well, to the point that I have to take it off outside or in the bathtub. It basically becomes a water balloon and even contained with him sitting in a high chair for a snack! My 5 month old also fits well and it goes nicely under a swim suit. The material seems quality and they've washed well in a regular diaper load and with other swim suits/ beach towels. Recommend having an extra on hand in case of poop.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable swim diaper!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised by these diapers. My son will be 2 in a couple months and today while swimming, he pooped and peed in his diaper and then proceeded to run around the yard and it did not leak at all. It has buttons on both sides, so it can be easily removed. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for something like this.
customer_reviews.author: CNHens

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for My Baby
customer_reviews.text: Where too small to fit around my one year old's thighs. It could fit around the waist at its widest, but we couldn't button the bottom thigh button. My little one is pretty chunky though, about 35 lbs, so would probably fit most 1 year olds. Just not mine. Otherwise, the pattern was super cute and would have probably worked perfect if it had fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great swim diapers
customer_reviews.text: Great reusable swim diaper. I have wash it over 45 times in the washer and put it in the dryer on low to dry; haven’t had a single issue with it. Quality product for a reasonable price! We use these for swim lessons 2x a week and have been using them for a couple months now. I love how they are adjustable and fit snug!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Randall

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, seems to keep messes in!
customer_reviews.text: I am so hapoy with this product. My dsughter is 2 months old and wears a size 1 diaper. You cannot find swim diapers in size 1, so I found this. I love that this has so many buttons to make it adjustable even for her size. It fits great and so far seems to keep the messes in!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Trexler

customer_reviews.title: Prefer disposable
customer_reviews.text: A little award to use but they do fit my baby. Its hard to snap when on the baby so easier to find out where you need to snap and then slide it up. I would prefer disposable over these though, but they dont make those small enough for her that I can find. I havent had to experience her pooping in it yet so not sure how it holds up to that.
customer_reviews.author: Brindle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and super easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who loves to play in the pool. We were using normal diapers but when the last one literally EXPLODED in the pool, I decided to buy these. They hold up well, clean up very well (solids roll right off them) and my daughter doesn't seem to even notice them. Definitely an amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: Histed

customer_reviews.title: Great diapers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4m old and her swim class requires her to wear 2 during class. They did the job one time she pooped and it stayed semi in! Would not say it is 100% sealed! I will say the first time you go to put them on, its a little confusing, but once you figure it out and do it a couple times it's a breeze! Cute patterns too!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter before our trip to Florida last year. They don't keep pee in but we didn't have any poop get loose in the pool. I love that they are adjustable so I wont have top worry about buying little swimmers ever again! She did poop in one but I literally just sprayed it off with the water hose and it came clean I probably coulda put it back on but it comes with 2 so no need to fret!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic swim diapers
customer_reviews.text: Great swim diapers bought for my 11 month old who is so little size 2 diapers currently they snap to his size perfectly and keep the waste in and out of the pool they look huge but keep in mind they are to fit up to a 3 year old and without a doubt they would love them great product quality and pricing
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: It holds everything inside but if you baby goes while in the water, prepare yourself for the messiness. Its like diarrhea! So now you’re at the beach/pool stuck with a messy reusable diaper that you can’t put back on the baby because, where are you going to wash it? If you’re no ready to leave the Pool/beach you got yourself a big problem. I much rather use the disposable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Torres

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective, comfortable, and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our two year old twins. They are comfortable, size is very versatile with several snaps, but getting slightly snug as my boys near three years old, best of all they are easy to wash! My boys love the cute prints. They are such a great, cost effective alternative to disposable swim diapers. Overall, they are a great product that I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and lovely idea
customer_reviews.text: We got these to wear under baby’s bathing suit when we go to the pool. They’re so cute and also perfect for playing in our tiny baby pool too I love the patterns and the vibrant colors!! It’s easy to get them too tight the first couple times putting them on baby. But I love that they can be adjusted on either hip and in the crotch area if needed
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Same size as size 4 diapers
customer_reviews.text: So cute, easy to use, way cheaper than disposables, but.... Won't fit a chunky baby long. These are about the same size as a size 4 diaper. My son is 21lbs and 28 in long and I don't see these lasting more than this summer.
customer_reviews.author: KolbR

customer_reviews.title: A little on the bigger side
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the size said 0-2 years. i guess i should have been a little weary with that wide of an age group. i bought this for my one year daughter. it was a tad bit too big for her. i think ill have to wait a few more months before we can really test this out in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kallel Edakkunnath

customer_reviews.title: Buy large size (0-3 years) for extended use!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute patterns that didn’t fade with fairly regular usage and washing (we’ve had them for a year. Snaps held securely and were easy to adjust, my only issue is that my son at 17 months is nowhere near the 30-40lb upper limit (he’s 26-27lbs and 34 inches, size 4 in Huggies) they claim the diaper can hold and it’s unlikely they will be useable in another month. I would recommend the purchase of these swim diapers, but just the 0-3 years large size ones instead if you want to use them for longer!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, but not 100% waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for our recent trip to the lake. After being in the water for just a bit my baby’s (4 month old) diaper was soaked. I tried different buttons to make sure it was tight, but the diaper was still wet when I took the swim diaper off. I guess it’s better than buying swim diapers. I do like how easy it is to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: These swim diapers are great except for the fact that the snaps are backwards. Instead of pulling the tabs up from the back and snapping in the front, you pulling them down and snapping them towards the back. Doesn't affect the function, but it's a little awkward feeling to get them all snapped up. I love the prints though so I won't complain too much!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya S.

customer_reviews.title: Snaps snaps snaps
customer_reviews.text: These are great 1 size swim diapers. Remember like most swim diapers they aren't designed to hold liquid my only complaint is they have alot more snaps than i'd expect and there aren't any you can leave snapped for next time or forgo snapping so it takes along time to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine, but they do run small. I bought for my almost 2yr old, who is just shy of 30lbs and he's definitely pushing the largest setting. That said, the prints are cute, they hold up well in the wash, and survived a full summer of water play. Would recommend to a smaller child :)
customer_reviews.author: SaraMarie

customer_reviews.title: Get them.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Affordable and better for the environment by far! Also better for your baby’s bum and then overall cause hey... less chemicals! Work well and hold everything in. Dry quickly in between swimming and changing if it was kept clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wills

customer_reviews.title: Hate the snap placement
customer_reviews.text: Didnt realize how you do the snaps. not like my regular cloth diapers. So makes it difficult to snap when my 10 month old wants to take off everywhere. Good quality. Its thin so the only thing its gonna catch are BMs,which is what I need it to do and has done.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: The construction is of really good quality and I love the overal design of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The construction is of really good quality and I love the overal design of the diaper being adjustable. It's "watertight" to the point where I need to unsnap the sides to let water out before I towel dry my 15 month old son. These are adjustable but if you have a big baby I would suggest another option. My son is 27+ lbs and these are tight around both his waist and legs on the last set of snaps.
customer_reviews.author: gafforama

customer_reviews.title: Does what they're designed for!
customer_reviews.text: They aren't absorbent bc they aren't supposed to be...im not sure why it asks that on the review. They work exactly like they are supposed to they adjust nicely in size and are super duper cute. These will last a long time. I would buy again and reccommend to anyone curious. They fit my 4 mo old and would adjust smaller if needed. They STILL for her at 8 mos( theta almost a 9 lb weight diff) with plenty of room to adjust bigger. They are nice and snug around legs and at tummy to hold in solid poo but not tooo tight. They do exactly what they are designed for. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my almost 3 month old daughter she used over a Pampers splasher’s diaper for her weekly swim classes. It is a bit big on her, but that is to be expected considering how little she still is. The price is very good and the designs are super cute. We will definitely be able to use these for a long time since the buttons are completely adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Not for 2.5 month babies
customer_reviews.text: It did not work with us. We tried them twice. For the second time baby got popped and it's licked. It was hard to wash it thoroughly by hands. Later on I was able to use washer and it helped better. I still have some hope that we'll use them later on when poops gonna be more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Oleksiy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but stains easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute pair but it stains easily, the white fabric turned yellowish right after the first use. It’s nice that it has different option for the push button but the leg part is already tight on my baby’s leg. It’s an awkward fit.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small
customer_reviews.text: I've put these through the laundry and they held up well. They are cute and they stay on. But they are a little small on the biggest setting. My one-year old is 25 lbs and I worry that the legs are too tight already.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used for about 20 beach days throughout the summer. Seemed to work fine. But are a little challenging to put on since they button in the back instead of the front. Never had a number 2 so I can speak on how well they to get function in such a scenario
customer_reviews.author: Lin-z

customer_reviews.title: Cute and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and love the adjustable buttons for size. My 3 month old is only 11lbs and they worked for her and i know it will fit her next summer too because of amount of buttons to adjust too. She did have a dirty one and it was not easy to get out. I believe it stained it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these and we totally did at first. We washed them and wore them 3 days, washing after each day, for about an hour, hour and a half tops. On the third day I noticed an insane rash on my daughter backside. It was so bad. We switched back to the non reusable ones unfortunately and haven’t had any more irritation issues
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little swim diapers. We used these all summer long with no problems. Our daughter never leaked through them which was such a relief! I love that they will grow with her over the years which makes them even more eco-friendly. Snaps held up great, lining was nice and taught, and the inside was a comfortable material for her. Also really loved that they have held up so well after so may washes and dips in the pool. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anamaria

customer_reviews.title: Love them! I would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.text: These worked excellently on my 20 lb 7 mos old during a recent trip to Florida. She would wear these for several hours per day and I’m sure she tinkled on things but I never noticed. She pooped a very small amount once and it did not escape.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Reusable makes them awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for great granddaughter and mommy says they do a great job! So much easier than the disposable swimmers and a lot less costly!!! They will also grow with them . Easy to snap into needed sizing!
customer_reviews.author: Nannie

customer_reviews.title: Too many snaps
customer_reviews.text: Cute and they work, but I struggled with all the snaps. We prefer the elastic waist and leg swim diapers, even though they are not adjustable. Trying to get the snaps done a wiggly 10 month old is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: So cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. My only thing is that I don't think that these will fit my daughter for very much longer. Right now she's 18 months and weighs about 21 pounds. I ordered the bigger ones hoping they would last longer but I guess I will know better next time. Overall I'm still very pleased with the quality and how well they are holding up after several uses and washings.
customer_reviews.author: CrashPyrette

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out
customer_reviews.text: These seemed very small based on the weight recommendation. I bought them for my daughter who just turned two to wear this summer. They fit, but only on the last snaps. She actually refused to wear then after the first couple of times; I'm not sure if they felt too tight or they were too different from the disposable ones she was used to. I was trying to save money but I ended up wasting it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great, but Small
customer_reviews.text: I really love having reusable swim diapers. It saves me money, and looks adorable! These are great, except they run small. I think the description says up to 30some pounds, but they are tight on my 20lbs daughter. And she's not overly chunky or skinny.
customer_reviews.author: KaniB

customer_reviews.title: love love love alva baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use their wetbags, regular cloth diapers and these as well for almost 8 years and multiple kids! They last!!! and they are cute AND ECO FRIENDLY!!!! Buy them you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Huge money saver
customer_reviews.text: I take my 9 month old daughter in the pool twice most days, these are an excellent alternative to disposable diapers. They have held up well, I like the snaps for sizing so she can grow into them too.
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 10lb son and 30lb son!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! And they fit both my boys. My oldest is 30 lbs and my youngest is 10 lbs. I was able to put the same swimmer on both of them. The snaps seem like they are sturdy and won't come undone. Right now I use it in the tub with my youngest to play in his floaty, but I can't wait to really check them out this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice colors, concerned of size
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9 month old just right. I worry that she may outgrow it soon though. Easy to wash. And I am sure she pees on it, but we haven't had any poop accidents yet to determine the damage if any.
customer_reviews.author: aimendoza4

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Use them on 4 month old granddaughter in pool, twice now had no idea she had pooped till we were inside changing her, nothing in pool. So easy to rinse out and clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Kamp

customer_reviews.title: Work great; and they will fit for a couple of years!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a faa weekend get away for our 5 month old baby. They fit great and she used them in the indoor and outdoor pools. We put a top on her and she was ready to go in her float. Looks like these will still fit her fine next year, which was important to me since they might not get much use until next spring. Our little one didn't happen to 'test' the diaper's ability to keep any solids in. Please keep in mind that these are swim diapers - so water and pee run through them. So use a regular diaper until your little one is in a place where liquids don't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought two different brand swim diapers at the same time. Shipping was good. The fit was definitely too small around the legs. Enough for my 2 yr old to complain and tey to adjust on her own. When using them they held waaaayyyy too much water. Had to literally let the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: These fit on my son and his much larger friend, no problem. Good quality and they worked. Only issue is the way the side snaps are on the back of the diaper rather than the front, making it a bit tougher to get onto a squirmy baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: To ask for a rating on absorbency or potty training has nothing to do with these, they are swim diapers. They do not hold pee, only poop. Very easy to use and adjustable. This fit my son well and he was 6lbs at the time. They will adjust for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Deneal Newburry

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet but they look sturdy, nice materials although doesn't look very absorbent though it should work for poops. They are so dang cute I cant wait to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cute designs
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike about these is that it barely fits my 7month old. I have it on the largest setting and it's almost too small (she's 18lbs 26" tall)
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Luke

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these can be adjusted as my kid grows. Snaps are heavy duty enough they don’t come undone. Big enough to have a diaper under them for a 6-18 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Langan

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool!
customer_reviews.text: I used these on my infant granddaughter in the pool. They worked perfect. No diaper needed just these. They grow with the baby and I know I'll get next year out of them also. Clean easily & dry.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and effective
customer_reviews.text: First, these are adorable. Second, they have several buttoning options to ensure a snug fit on your little one. Third, it works! Super happy with my purchase and highly recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize reusable swim diapers were a thing, but they're very cute, and a great price! I love that they are easily thrown into the washing machine. I 100% recommend them over disposable swim diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Kalene

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great for summer! My daughter uses these all the time. They are perfect swim diapers and as cute as swim suits. Match with a plain rash gaurd shirt and good to go! I wash with my cloth diapers
customer_reviews.author: Nicole O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 6 month old when she goes swimming and they are very lightweight and easy to put on/take off. They handle accidents and can be used as a swimsuit by themselves with the cute decorations.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: The print is cute. Other than that I am disappointed. They do not fit up to 30 lbs!! My granddaughter weights 19 lbs. She is 18 mos. old, very tall and skinny. The product left deep red grooves. She pulled them off due to them being uncomfortable. I wish they came in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: D. Simon

customer_reviews.title: They’re so much better than disposable.
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo much better than the disposable swim diapers. We have a pool and are in it nearly every day may-September. That’s a lot of money wasted if we used disposable. They’re easy to clean and haven’t had any issues. I’m so happy I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Harwell

customer_reviews.title: Fit well over a disposable swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a month now on my 6 month old and they work great! I do use a disposable swim diaper underneath with these on top and they fit well. I haven't had her poop in them yet so I can't say if they would leak for that. I make sure to only take her swimming after she has gone!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to disposable
customer_reviews.text: Great for pool but they need to be well cleaned because they hold on to the smell of urine. I’ve bleached them with chlorine bleach and there was no change to color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these, we used them for our son on a recent vacation. I was concerned for the many little clips hurting my sons body, however, they were not rough and of course I tried not to keep them on for longer than the necessary time. They run small because my baby is four months old and these will not fit more than a couple months. My son didn't poop on them so I don't know how good they'll be, but they're lovely and they worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: alfredo negrete

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: I had his higher expectations. They are okay. My son just turned 1. 23lbs 31.25" tall and these are too tight around his legs on the largest setting. The quality seems to be decent but bummed that he is only one and they are too tight. I thought they were up to 2yrs.
customer_reviews.author: sdebar

customer_reviews.title: They grow with the baby.. love the way they snap to fit ..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our new granddaughter. I purchased 4 different designs for our beach vacation and she was the cutest little Angel baby on the coast..
customer_reviews.author: mom8690

customer_reviews.title: Quality and grows with baby
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 11 lb son and are still fitting him st 13 lb. They will fit him for a long time. They are made and wash well. I put mine in a bag to wash. The snaps were tricky at first, but we got them down. I sometimes use these with cloth diapers when he has a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Mack

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend these diapers to anyone with a little baby wanting ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these diapers when my son was six months old and he has worn them several times a month since then as we have taken him to the pool, swim lessons and other general water activities. At 2 years old and 28+ pounds he is finally growing out of them and we are buying "extra-large" in a different brand. I would highly recommend these diapers to anyone with a little baby wanting a swim diaper that will last them a long time. We will be setting these aside for baby #2!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Burris

customer_reviews.title: overall good
customer_reviews.text: super easy to clean but hard to put on the elastics and snaps with a squirmy baby make it difficult to put on but overall I am happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Morris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reusable swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed these. I highly recommend these if you plan to be in the water alot with your baby. It just didn't make sense to me to purchase the disposable swim diapers. These are cute, easy to put on and take off and adjustable. My little man is now 17 months and still has plenty of growing room. He is going to start his third 6 week set of swim lessons soon and we love these.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I kept going back and forth about getting a reusable swim diaper or disposable ones for my 7 month old son. I am happy I went with these. They hold everything in (he has pooped in them a couple times) and they seem comfortable to wear. They are easy to put on and they have room for him to grow!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Very functional swim diaper! My daughter wears 12mo clothes, and this still has room to grow. Will probably be able to wear it next summer, too.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these because a pack of three is the same price as only one iplay swim diaper. However, I really hated them. They fit terribly, despite the adjustable buttons. Back the the iplay ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 6 month old at the pool. They work great and fit perfectly and will probably fit her again next year bc you can adjust the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Haven't mastered it, but really cute!
customer_reviews.text: The patterns on these swim diapers are so adorable. We use a disposable swim diaper underneath and use these more as a swim suit since our baby is just a few months old and sits on our laps in the pool. I don't want to test the strength of it with an EBF baby poo on my lap! I haven't quite figured out the sizing of it and how it will fit a larger child since our little guy (5.5 months, 15 lbs) is already on the biggest snap at the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Too confusing
customer_reviews.text: These are weird. Too many snaps to deal with when trying to put on a 18 month old. Wouldn’t buy again. Just went and bought swimmies
customer_reviews.author: Connie schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product Low Cost
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cute product! Sizing does seem to be universal as there are several buttons to adjust sizing. Material is soft and durable.
customer_reviews.author: MrsLucas

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected....
customer_reviews.text: overall I'm sure they are fine swim diaper.... put them on my daughter to go to the beach, she fell asleep on me and peed.... and I Was soaked. maybe in the water they are fine but not great for just chilling at the beach or poolside as a just in case we go in the water (its also entirely possible this is just a mom fail and I didn't read the warnings close enough LOL)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, poor sizing
customer_reviews.text: These work well however my daughter is 24lbs, 12 months and these barely fit her anymore. Sizing seems to be really off
customer_reviews.author: MKE

customer_reviews.title: No more disposable diapers!
customer_reviews.text: No more disposable swim diapers! This Reusable swim diaper is amazing! There are so many different size combinations so it will grow with your baby. I was able to use it on my one month old premie and I had zero issues in the pool with her.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spiker

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: My 21 month old is 31 pounds and these didn’t fit at all, ordered the 0-3 size and will update after we try those. They did seem like good quality though, love all the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: OscarA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable on my son. I wish I’d known about something like this when my older kids were younger.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

product_meta.title: ALVABABY Swim Diapers 2pcs Reusable Adjustable & Washalbe for Boys & Girls 0-2 Years DYK13-14
feature_bullets: FASION & STYLISH －A trim and attractive design that has a terrific fit on any baby. It can accommodate a range of different body shapes.

HIGN QUALITY, ADJUSTABLE, REUSABLE & WATERPROOF －ALVABABY swim diapers are made from waterproof 100% polyester PUL outer layer. Elastics waist and legs: Interior Polyester Elastics at the waist and leg openings with soft lycra bindings provides a secure, stretchy fit and easy on and off.

SAVE MONEY & ECO-FRIENDLY－Our reusable cloth swim diapers are designed for families who require premium products. Adjustable for 0-2 years, our 3×3 snaps adjust around the waist and legs with three different sizes, and three different size adjustments for the height of the baby swim diapers. No disposable swim diaper, save your money in the long run and advocate environmental protection, provide a beautiful environment for the our baby.

ENJOY SWIMMING－Our swim diapers designed for holding solids,these swim diapers don’t have much absorbency and don’t hold water so that your baby can be incredibly lightweight when swimming. Let your baby swim in style.

SINCERE SERVICE & NO RISK －1 year guarantee. If you have any problems with the product, please feel free to contact us, we’ll send you a new one or refund your money of your choice. Please select the size suitable for your baby according to the size chart before order. If your baby with thick legs or need more room to grow up, we’d advice you can choose our new larger size swim diapers.

specifications.Material free: BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Latex Free, Lead Free
specifications.Style: Swim diaper,red stars white circle,classic blue floating flowers
